description: This file defines the interface class IOmiProxy within the omi namespace. The class provides virtual methods for mounting and unmounting crypted bundles, and for registering/unregistering error listeners related to omi_dbus_api interactions. It contains an enum class ErrorType and a typedef for an error listener callback, indicating its role in error handling and proxy management for OMI communication.

classes.name: IOmiProxy
classes.description: Interface class that wraps around an omi_dbus_api to provide simplified method calls, including mounting/unmounting crypted bundles and managing error listeners.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, root filesystem path, and config path; outputs the decrypted bundle path. Returns true on success.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts the crypted bundle with the specified ID; returns true on success.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers a listener for omi error events, returning a listener ID or 0 on failure.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters the listener identified by the given tag.

ctags.name: OmiErrorListener
ctags.pattern: /^    typedef std::function<void(const std::string&, ErrorType, const void*)> OmiErrorListener;$/
